statements: SELECT * FROM article_sentiments;
SELECT title, content FROM article_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT title FROM article_sentiments WHERE article_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT article_id, sentiment_score FROM article_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0.0 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM article_sentiments ORDER BY article_id ASC, sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM article_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY title DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT title, sentiment_score FROM article_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC
SELECT article_id, title, content FROM article_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY article_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM article_sentiments WHERE content LIKE '%technology%' OR content LIKE '%innovation%' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT title, sentiment_score FROM article_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8 AND content LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY title ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM news_articles;
SELECT id, title, author FROM news_articles WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM news_articles ORDER BY author ASC, title DESC;
SELECT id, title, sentiment_score FROM news_articles WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT title, content FROM news_articles WHERE author='Jane Smith' AND sentiment_score < 0.2;
SELECT * FROM news_articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, content FROM news_articles WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM news_articles JOIN article_bias ON news_articles.id = article_bias.article_id WHERE bias_type = 'political' AND confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM news_articles WHERE title LIKE '%COVID%' OR content LIKE '%pandemic%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT author, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment FROM news_articles GROUP BY author HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 0.3 ORDER BY avg_sentiment DESC;
SELECT * FROM news_articles;
SELECT title, content FROM news_articles ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT id, sentiment_score, bias_detected FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT article_id, author_name FROM article_authors WHERE author_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT id, title, content, published_date FROM news_articles WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM news_articles WHERE published_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, content FROM news_articles WHERE title LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT id, sentiment_score, bias_detected FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 AND bias_detected = true;
SELECT author_name FROM article_authors WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT id, title, content, published_date FROM news_articles ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM NewsArticles;
SELECT article_text, publish_date FROM NewsArticles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT article_id, bias_score FROM NewsArticles WHERE bias_score > 0.5;
SELECT author_name, article_text FROM Authors INNER JOIN ArticleAuthors ON Authors.author_id = ArticleAuthors.author_id;
SELECT article_text, sentiment_score, sentiment_type FROM NewsArticles JOIN Sentiments ON NewsArticles.article_id = Sentiments.article_id;
SELECT * FROM NewsArticles
SELECT article_id, article_text FROM NewsArticles
SELECT article_id, publish_date FROM NewsArticles ORDER BY publish_date DESC
SELECT aa.article_id, aa.author_id, a.author_name FROM ArticleAuthors AS aa JOIN Authors AS a ON aa.author_id = a.author_id
SELECT na.article_id, na.article_text, s.sentiment_score, s.sentiment_type FROM NewsArticles AS na LEFT JOIN Sentiments AS s ON na.article_id = s.article_id
SELECT * FROM Articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, author FROM Articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, content, author FROM Articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM Articles WHERE title LIKE '%data%' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT name, website, country FROM Publications ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, title, author FROM Articles WHERE publication_date = '2022-01-20';
SELECT id, sentiment_score, sentiment_type FROM Sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Authors ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, author_id, bias_score FROM BiasAnalysis WHERE bias_score < 0 ORDER BY bias_score ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, website, country FROM Publications WHERE country = 'USA';
